verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Isn't He
Beautiful
Beautiful
Isn't He
Prince of Peace
Son of God
Isn't He

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Isn't He
Wonderful
Wonderful
Isn't He
Counselor
Almighty God
Isn't He

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord You are
Beautiful
Beautiful
Yes You are
Prince of Peace
Son of God
Lord You are
Yes You are

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lord You are
Wonderful
Wonderful
Lord You are
Counselor
Almighty God
Lord You are
Yes You are
Wonderful
